attributes.additional_details: I want Government to discuss possibility to convince Boris Johnson to return as PM.
attributes.background: While we had dinner, my wife told me: I don`t like the actual PM and I will be very happy if Boris Johnson will return as PM. So, I promised her I will start a petition and if it will have over 10 k signatures, the Government will respond.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes requests for changes to who is Prime Minister.
